sentences.sContent: The commander showed great sangfroid and acted without ever losing his composure.
sentences.sContent_eng: The commander showed great sangfroid and acted without ever losing his composure.
sentences.sCn: 船长表现得尤其从容镇定，行动中丝毫没有失去冷静。

sentences.sContent: Few men possessed the necessary sangfroid for this kind of operation, but Fache seemed born for it.
sentences.sContent_eng: Few men possessed the necessary sangfroid for this kind of operation, but Fache seemed born for it.
sentences.sCn: 很少有人拥有从事这项工作的所必需的沉着，但法希天生是干这个的料。

remMethod.val: 来自法语， 原意为“冷血的”； sang(血) + froid(冷的) → 冷血的
